attributes.action: Establish Fixed Term Parliaments in UK
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The serving Prime Minister has the power to call an election when he or she chooses. This creates lengthy speculation in the media and can often detract from the main purpose of Government. A fixed term, of a length determined by Parliament, would allow the media to concentrate on the parties' abilities to govern the UK.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
